content: cellphone tote designed by mimi alelis ©2007 http //mimi csa googlepages com/ skill level easy continue on to the strap finished measurement strap approx 2 ½ x 4 ½ inches row 1 chain 2 double_crochet together the next 2 sts double_crochet materials in the next 8 sts double_crochet decrease the last 2 sts turn cannon size 8 thread or substitute size 10 11 sts thread 1 ball is enough to make 3 totes row 2 chain 2 double_crochet decrease first two sts double_crochet in the steelcrochet hook no 4 or size1 5mm or next 6 sts double_crochet decrease the last 2 sts turn 9 sts size to obtain gauge row 3 chain 2 double_crochet decrease first 2 sts double_crochet in the 1 button next 4 sts double_crochet decrease the last 2 sts turn 7 sts yarn needle for weaving ends row 4 chain 2 double_crochet decrease first 2 sts double_crochet in the gauge 18 sts and 9 double_crochet row = 2 next 2 sts double_crochet decrease the last 2 sts turn 5 sts abbreviations row 5-22 chain 2 counts as one st double_crochet in chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch st = stitch each st across 5 sts single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet row 23 chain 2 double_crochet in the same st double_crochet in the treble_crochet = triple crochet round = round double_crochet decrease = next 3 sts 2 double_crochet in the last st turn 7 sts double_crochet together row 24 chain 2 double_crochet in the same st double_crochet in the note printed pattern is created when next 5 sts 2 double_crochet in the last st turn 9 sts using multicolor thread row 25 buttonhole row chain 2 double_crochet in the tote next 2 sts treble_crochet in the next st chain 2 skip 1 st treble_crochet round 1 starting at the bottom ch11 3 single_crochet in in next st double_crochet in last 3 sts turn 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in each of the next8 row 26 chain 2 double_crochet in the next 2 sts skip chain 5 single_crochet in next chain one st single_crochet inch 2-space skip one st double_crochet in the working on the opposite side of chain single_crochet in last 3 sts turn 7 sts next 8 chain 2 single_crochet in last chain join with slip_stitch to row 27 edging chain 1 single_crochet all around edge the 1st single_crochet 26 single_crochet of strap and tote finish off round 2 note beginning chain 2 counts as sew button for closure one double_crochet throughout pattern chain 2 double_crochet in same st 2 double_crochet in each of next 2 st double_crochet in next 8 sts 2 double_crochet in each of the next 5 sts double_crochet in next 8 sts 2 double_crochet in last 2 sts join 36 double_crochet round 3 chain 2 double_crochet in same st 2 double_crochet in each of next 3 sts double_crochet in next 12 sts 2 double_crochet in each of the next 6 sts double_crochet in next 12 sts 2 double_crochet in last 2 sts
